text: pūmiyil ūrntu tiriyakkūṭiyavaiyum, taṉ iru iṟakkaikaḷāl (ākāyattil) paṟakkak kūṭiyavaiyum uṅkaḷaip pōṉṟa (uyiruḷḷa) paṭaippukaḷē (camutāyaṅkaḷē) tavira vēṟillai. (Ivaṟṟil) oṉṟaiyumē (nam pativup) puttakattil (lavhul mahḥpūḷil) kuṟippiṭātu nām viṭṭuviṭavillai. Piṉṉar, (oru nāḷil) ivaiyum taṅkaḷ iṟaivaṉiṭam koṇṭu varappaṭum
